title: ISic020712. ISic020712
body:
Facsimile Images

Λαπε
Lape

Apparatus criticus

Text after Antonaccio, Shea 2015

English translation

Take (the mug)!

Italian translation

Prendi (la tazza)!

commentary

Similar to another document from Morgantina, a kylix exhorting drinking with an inscription on the interior bottom of it (ISic020711), this is probably also an 'interactive' document, to use Antonaccio and Shea's words (Antonaccio, Shea 2015, p. 60). «If this [sc. λαπε] is a Sikeliote Greek imperative, it is possible that λάπε is standing in for the aorist imperative λαβέ from λαμβάνω. If so, the bottom of this mug is exhorting the potential user to ‘take it!’ which is plausible if it were hanging from a wall or resting upside down on a shelf with the base visible» (Antonaccio, Shea 2015, p. 61).

bibliography

  • Antonaccio, Shea 2015 60-61, fig. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002358
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
